00032 #include <QPixmap>
00033 
00034 class KVILIB_API KviPixmap
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         KviPixmap();
00038         KviPixmap(const char * path);
00039         KviPixmap(const KviPixmap &pix);
00040         ~KviPixmap();
00041 private:
00042         QPixmap * m_pPix;
00043         QString    m_szPath;
00044 public:
00045         bool isNull(){ return m_pPix == 0; };
00046         bool load(const char * path);
00047         bool load(const QString& path);
00048         const QString& path() const { return m_szPath; };
00049         QPixmap * pixmap() const { return m_pPix; };
00050         void set(const QPixmap &pix,const QString &szPath);
00051         KviPixmap & operator=(const KviPixmap &pix);       // deep copy
00052         void setNull();
00053 };
00054 
00055 namespace KviPixmapUtils
00056 {
00057         extern KVILIB_API void drawPixmapWithPainter(QPainter* p,QPixmap * pix,int flags,const QRect& paintRect,int iWidgetWidth,int iWidgetHeight,int dx,int dy);
00058         inline void drawPixmapWithPainter(QPainter* p,QPixmap * pix,int flags,const QRect& paintRect,int iWidgetWidth,int iWidgetHeight)
00059                 { KviPixmapUtils::drawPixmapWithPainter(p,pix,flags,paintRect,iWidgetWidth,iWidgetHeight,paintRect.left(),paintRect.top()); }
